title: Charley Harper Welcome Cardinal Coir Doormat
description:
Our Welcome Cardinal Coir Doormat from master illustrator Charley Harper is the perfect greeting for friends and guests. Eco-friendly coir is a natural way to clean both shoes and paws alike. Anti-slip rubber backing helps keep the mat secure.

  • Dimensions: 36 x 24 in.

       Additional shipping $15 per order.

       This item cannot be shipped to a destination outside the United States.
